meaningMnemonic: Passed out in front of the <radical>gate</radical> lies a <radical>drunkard</radical> who used to be the <radical>leader</radical> of a popular <kanji>clique</kanji>, the Cool Kids <kanji>Clan</kanji>. Once, he was a leader, but now he is but a drunkard. The clan has fallen apart, and he no longer has a clique to call his own.
readingMnemonic: Eventually you get sick and tired of this washed up <kanji>clan</kanji> leader and you gather your own <kanji>clique</kanji> to chase this guy away from your gate and your property. You and your friends grab some <reading>bats</reading> (ばつ) and use these bats to beat the drunkard leader. Being beaten with bats frightens him, and he scurries away.
